\documentclass[border=1pt]{standalone}
%\usetikzlibrary{...}% tikz package already loaded by 'tikz' option
\usepackage{amsmath}
\usepackage[table]{xcolor}
\usepackage{tikz}

\newcommand{\MyTikzmark}[2]{%
     \tikz[overlay,remember picture,baseline] \node [anchor=base] (#1) {$#2$};%
}

\newcommand{\DrawVLine}[3][]{%
  \begin{tikzpicture}[overlay,remember picture]
    \draw[shorten <=0.3ex, #1] (#2.north) -- (#3.south);
  \end{tikzpicture}
}

\newcommand{\DrawHLine}[3][]{%
  \begin{tikzpicture}[overlay,remember picture]
    \draw[shorten <=0.2em, #1] (#2.west) -- (#3.east);
  \end{tikzpicture}
}
\begin{document}
\thispagestyle{empty}

%0 & 0 & 1 & 4 & 0 & -1 \\

M=\begin{pmatrix}
\MyTikzmark{topA}{1} & {2} & \MyTikzmark{topB}{0} & {-2} & \MyTikzmark{topC}{0} & {3} \\
0 & 0 & 1 & 4 & 0 & -1 \\
0 & 0 & 0 & 0 & 1 & 2 \\
\MyTikzmark{leftA}{0} & 0 & 0 & 0 & 0 & \MyTikzmark{rightA}{0} \\
\MyTikzmark{leftB}{0} & 0 & 0 & 0 & 0 & \MyTikzmark{rightB}{0} \\
\MyTikzmark{leftC}{0} & {0} & \MyTikzmark{bottomB}{0} & {0} & \MyTikzmark{bottomC}{0} & \MyTikzmark{rightC}{0} \\
\end{pmatrix}\rightarrow\begin{pmatrix}2&-2&3\\ 0&4&-1 \\ 0&0&2 \end{pmatrix}=L
$
